updates.title: AI coding assistant Cursor raises massive $2.3B funding round just 5 months after previous raise, signaling accelerated investment in AI development tools. The company plans to expand its Composer AI model that automates complex coding workflows.

Google launches Deep Research tool for NotebookLM and expands SIMA 2 agent capabilities, positioning for December product updates. SIMA 2 uses Gemini to reason and act in virtual environments, marking progress toward general-purpose AI agents.

OpenAI pilots group chat features in ChatGPT across select markets, with leaked documents revealing significant Microsoft infrastructure costs. Watch for broader rollout announcements and potential pricing adjustments as OpenAI manages scaling expenses.

VCs abandon traditional investment rules for AI startups as market dynamics shift rapidly, with emphasis on open-source strategies to compete with China's AI development. Expect more unconventional funding rounds and accelerated AI startup valuations through December.

Apple tightens App Store guidelines around third-party AI integrations while LinkedIn rolls out AI-powered people search to premium users. Anticipate more platform policy updates affecting AI app development and enterprise AI tool adoption before year-end.
